title: The St. Regis Macao rolls out the red carpet with exclusive opening offer
text:
The St. Regis Macao rolls out the red carpet with exclusive opening offer The St. Regis Macao rolls out the red carpet with exclusive opening offer Details Category: Hotel Created on Wednesday, 26 August 2015 09:15 With a much anticipated debut in December 2015, The St. Regis Macao celebrates the launch of its booking channels with the unveiling of an exclusive opening package In preparation for its Grand Opening in December this year, The St. Regis Macao, Cotai Central has opened up all direct booking channels and is now ready to receive reservations from guests looking to experience Macau’s finest expression of elegance. 
Conveniently located along the vibrant Cotai Strip which offers easy access to over 600 unparalleled retail outlets, hundreds of dining options and a diverse range of world-class entertainment, The St. Regis Macao is poised to become the most coveted address in the popular tourist destination. Aspiring to set a new standard for luxury and bespoke service in Macau, The St. Regis Macao will feature 400 exquisitely styled and lavishly appointed guest rooms and suites ranging from 53 sqm to 477 sqm, providing the most discerning travelers with a unique luxurious respite from the hectic urban pace. The hotel’s strategic location and distinctive layout accords sweeping views of the Cotai Strip, with almost all guest rooms commanding not just great, but rare vistas of both the iconic Venetian and the Parisian that is scheduled to open next year. The St. Regis Macao will also feature a mélange of Eastern and Western influences that are expertly weaved together to create a distinctive world of flavors. The hotel’s signature restaurant The Manor comprises five individual escapes from the hustle and bustle of the Cotai Strip while The St. Regis Bar, with its intimate setting is the perfect venue for social gatherings or discreet meetings. The Iridium Spa elevates the senses with specialty treatments on the 38th floor. “We are thrilled to bring the St. Regis to Macau,” said Daniella Tonetto, General Manager of Sales and Marketing for The St. Regis Macao. “We believe we are perfectly positioned to cater to a new generation of both leisure and corporate travelers who seek a differentiated experience. The St. Regis brand’s world-renowned standard of service and luxury strengthens our ability to deliver on a promise that will raise Macau’s profile as a world center of tourism and leisure.” The St. Regis Macao will also offer the signature St. Regis Butler Service for every guest room and suite, a first for any hotel in Macau. This 24-hour anticipatory service will customize each guest’s stay to their specific needs, tastes and preferences. “Our core values can be summed up as delivering to our guests an uncompromising, personalized and seductive experience at the most prestigious address,” said Paul Cunningham, The St. Regis Macao’s General Manager. “All our staff undergo the necessary training to ensure they fully comprehend and embrace this philosophy. We understand that these values need to shine through at every interaction with our guests, and this is how we can set ourselves apart from the competition.” To offer guests the opportunity to be among the first to experience this new level of refinement, the hotel is offering a celebratory package that includes: • Luxurious accommodation with 24 hour signature Butler Service • Daily breakfast for two at The Manor • Welcome beverage upon arrival • Daily hotel credit of MOP 600 • Late check-out • A specially selected celebratory gift • Double StarPoints for SPG members Exclusive rates start from HKD 2,688++ per night for a Deluxe Room, available for stays from 17 December 2015.
